definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: In high energy region, the asymptotic freedom perturbation theory is used.
sentences.chinese: 在高能時，應用漸近自由的微擾論。

sentences.english: In this paper, the logarithmic perturbation scheme for the central potential field is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 對中心勢場的對數微擾論方法作了進一步探討。
